oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Gatlin Brothers Interview - Biff Collie - Tape 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of an interview with the Gatlin Brothers (performance group) conducted by Biff Collie.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Larry Gatlin; Steve Gatlin; Rudy Gatlin; Biff Collie
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Biff Collie introduces, with jokes, Steve Gatlin, Rudy Gatlin, and Larry Gatlin -- (01:06) Larry Gatlin talks about 'If love Wont Heal a Lady' and Twin Falls -- (02:07) The Gatlin brothers joke about hotel keys and songwriting process -- (04:42) Larry speaks about leaving an airport '#1 Heartache Place' -- (05:27) Rudy and Larry speaks about Dottie West and cutting the record 'Rain' -- (07:23) 'Pure 'N Simple' album title is discussed -- (09:33) Gatlin Brothers discuss instrumentation on their records -- (10:05) Gatlin brothers harmonize to sing 'Healin' Stream' -- (11:20) Larry speaks about getting inspiration from golfing and being a helicopter -- (12:05) Larry talks about the piano ballad he sung and its success -- (13:18) Gatlin brothers speak of a song they wrote for Merle Haggard and George Strait -- (16:20) The Gatlin Brothers speaks about the bluegrass ballad [unidentified] -- (17:08) The Gatlin Brothers and Collie joke about Collie's shoes
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Gatlin Brothers; Gatlin, Larry; Gatlin, Larry, 1948-; Gatlin, Rudy; Gatlin, Steve; Collie, Biff;
